name: Central Concern
description:
For decades, the genre of shoot'em up has gone largely unchanged.....until now

Obliterate extraterrestrial threats of unknown motives in a sensory seamless blend 
between the worlds of Shoot'em ups and the Typing genre.
You hold down your puny fort as commander Oda Aster (fully voiced)
in a minimalistic game void of violence and blood.

Central Concern is a short stimulant that respects your time,
if you know when to give up that is.
NB: the game is not for casuals. Adapt and overcome
